metadata.name: Float
metadata.description:
Float embodies an adventurous spirit, appreciation of the earth and the world without limitations.

Inspired by my connection with nature. The idea came from a very old drawing I made for myself when I started surfing and fell in love with the ocean. Years later, after more experience as an artist, I still love the emotions and the memories it brings back so I decided to recreate this piece and bring it to life.

Year created 2022
Mint 2022
Animation by Thawatchai Chunhachai
Music By Artificial.Music
